Name: Forgotten World
About the game: Hello everyone! This game made with rpg maker mv will take you to world of Oblis, where you can follow the adventure of the three protagonist: Zephro Nepium, Jura Detio and Regart Posimar. These three heroes are looking for the three scrolls that activates their sword in order to unlock their true power: The Tabula Rasa. This game is inspired from the actual manga 'Forgotten World' written and draw by Cristian Maraglino. You can find this manga on our facebook page!. The image above is draw by Cristian Maraglino and represents one of the three heroes: The black mage, Zephro Nepium. Main characteristics: ° Old style game with 2d graphics ° Combat system improved and better than original ° Unique skills created with unique animations for every heroes ° Quest System Journal: this system allows you to follow the main quests and sub-quests without problems. ° A lot of sub-quests useful and not just 'talk to ' or ' defeat some moster' Then try our game and discover why these heroes are trying to unlock this power!
